author: PTI
title: Coronavirus: Celebrate Gudi Padwa at home, says Maharashtra Governer
description: The number of COVID-19 patients in the state stood at 101 as on Tuesday.
content: MUMBAI: Maharashtra Governor Bhagat Singh Koshyari on Tuesday asked people to celebrate Gudi Padwa, which marks the beginning of New Year in the state, indoors due to the novel coronavirus outbreak. The number of COVID-19 patients in the state stood at 101 as… [+689 chars]
